alert.note: Alert for Ballard; McCracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 6:51PM EDT until May 07 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Pulaski County in southern Illinois... West central Massac County in southern Illinois... Northern Ballard County in western Kentucky... Northwestern McCracken County in western Kentucky... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 551 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near La Center, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... La Center, Barlow, Kevil, Joppa and Olmsted. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
